definitions.definition: Of a class of verbs which take both a direct and an indirect object. An example is 'give', which entails a giver ( subject ), a gift ( direct object ) and a receiver ( indirect object ).

main_definition: ( grammar ) Of a class of verbs which take both a direct and an indirect object. An example is 'give', which entails a giver ( subject ), a gift ( direct object ) and a receiver ( indirect object ).
